form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Use of the Affidavit of Support to Overcome Public Charge Grounds ( (Continued)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 Part 7. Use of the Affidavit of Support to Overcome Public Charge Grounds (Continued) I acknowledge that section 213A(a)(1)(B) of the Act grants the sponsored immigrant(s) and any Federal State. local or privase agency thas pays any means-lessed public benefit to or on behalf of the sponsored immigrands) standing 10 sue me for failing 10 mees my obligations under this affidavit of support I agree 10 submit to the personal jurisdiction of any court of the United States or of any State, territory. or possession of the United States if the court has subject matter jurisdiction of a civil Lawsuis to enforce this affidavit of support I agree that no Lawsuis to enforce this affidavit of support shall be barred by any statute of limitations that might otherwise apply. so long as the plainsiff initiates the civil Lawsuis no later than sen (10) years after the dase on which a sponsored immigrant lass received any means-tested public benefits. Collection of Judgment / acknowledge that a plainsiff may seek specific performance of my support obligarion. Furthermore. any money judgment against me based on this affidavit of support may be collected through the use of a judgement lien under 28 U.S.C. 3201, a writ of execution under 28 U.S.C. 3203, a judicial installment payment order under 28 U.S.C. 3204. garnishmens under 28 U.S.C. 3205. or through the use of any corresponding remedy under State law. / may also be held liable for costs of collection including attorney fees. Concluding Provisions. 1. ODEHE BAZILE . certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that: (a) I know she contents of this affidavis of support signed by me: (b) All she statements in this affidavit of support are muc and correct: (c) / make this affidavit of support for the considerasion stated in Part 7. freely. and without any mental reservation or purpose of evasion: (d) Income Lax returns submitted in support of this affidavit are true copies of the returns filed with the Internal Revenue Service: and (e) Any other evidence submitted is mue and correct. x Odette Bazile 12-13-01 (Sponsor's Signature) (Date) Subscribed and sworn to (or affirmed) before me this 13 th day of DECEMbeR . 2001 (Month) (Year) at BROWARD County Fl My commission expires on 4-14-03 Caleb Buisson Caleb pussion Commission # CC 817989 Signature of Nocary Public or Officer Administering Oath) FLORIDA Expires Apr. 14, 2003 Bonded Thru NOTARY Public (Title) Atlantic Bonding Co., Inc. Part 8. If someone other than the sponsor prepared this affidavit of support, that person must complete the following: I certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that I prepared this affidavit of support at the sponsor's request and that this affidavit of support is based on all information of which I have knowledge Signature Print Your Name Date Daytime Telephone Number babb busion CAeb Baisson 12-13-01 ( ) Firm Name and Address Form 1-864 (1/21/98)Y Page 6 10
